name: symgfv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))

stmt.origin: ffvelrnda(c2, c3, c0, c3, wcel(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: ffvelrnda(c2, c3, c0, c3, c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c3, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c3, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c0, c3, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csymg, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 : c3 → c3))
⊣ c4 =(SymGrp ` c3)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(csymg, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))

comment: The function value of a permutation. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2019.)
